experience.title: Data Engineer
summary: Being a go-to person for infrastructure and its automation and deployment.
Introducing dbt and lifting-and-shifting existing data models.
Educating analysts about dbt and the best collaboration standards.
Automating data model development standards (dbt), including checking for documentation, ownership, linting, formatting, and testing during CI.
Driving the introduction and setup of the data monitoring library (elementary).
Setting up new data pipelines as well as providing clean data to work with.
'Spamming' with documentation and diagrams to decrease bus factor.
Implementing the first streaming pipeline and setting up foundations for developing new ones.

experience.title: Software Engineer
summary: Designed and built caching proxy with automatic cache invalidation on data refresh to speed up data fetching on front-end from multiple systems.
Drove implementation of credit score dashboard as a micro-frontend project.

experience.title: Junior JavaScript Engineer
summary: Migrated to a new authentication system provider.
Refactored legacy front-end project from jQuery to TypeScript.
Improved tooling (testing frameworks, linters, formatters, Makefiles).
Wrote and maintained services' documentation and tech designs.
